headline: 'This is a massive crime against humanity': Trump says we 'can't let' the situation in Ukraine continue and slams 'paper tiger' NATO for its inaction
author: Gina Martinez
sentences: It won't matter what Obiden does to us, the same progressive dim bulbs in the propaganda press and Democrat party will still hold Trump in their sights, should they even permit him to run and win again in 2024, which they won't.

I don't know, but I am certain that Putin is bad and Ukraine wants their freedom from the Russian boot heel, just like all the countries of eastern Europe who were controlled by Stalin and his successors.
Which is why I'm looking for a 2024 candidate that has the fight and policies of Trump with better impulse control...ie not blurting out whatever comes to mind.
The problem that I've always had with Trump is that I firmly believe that he could be a tyrant were there no checks and balances.
Because our cowardly, weak and stupid leaders, Putin assumed that we would not follow up with out promise.
He is correct about NATO, and the US should leave, break up the band before it nets us more trouble.
No, but we should have been arming Ukraine steadily all along so that they could defend themselves.
And Putin has said he admires Stalin, the guy who killed millions of Ukrainians in the 1930s.
Meanwhile, China is tying up the world with its Belt and Road...no shots fired or required.
Likewise, we also don't need a president surrounded by men determined to bring him down.
If FPDT actually proposes to "respond" in some military fashion, he's wrong.
For those afraid of that Rusian Bear, how's it going for them in Ukraine?
The last thing this country needs is a president surrounded by yes men.
The USA made a promise to 'protect the integrity of Ukrainian borders'.
They're a second-rate land power struggling in a war on its border...
But the faithful want red meat served with a flourish.
Do I think we should send in American troops?
Putin is ALWAYS a bad guy, always has been.
Is Ukrainian leadership now good?
Dollar Diplomacy done right.
That is unequivocal.
Amerika is done for.
